descriptions: Transform your home into a winter wonderland with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! This set includes 1 stunning lighted Christmas wreath adorned with pine cones and red berries, 2 festive garlands with warm yellow LED lights, 2 elegant red Christmas bows, and a sturdy metal hanger for easy display. Made of high-quality PE synthetic fir, these decorations are perfect for front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantels, porches, cabinets, and shelves. Bring the spirit of the season to your home with this beautiful set - ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties. Don't miss out on adding a touch of holiday magic to your space!

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! This set includes 1 lighted Christmas wreath, 2 garlands with lights, 2 red bows, and 1 metal hanger to effortlessly decorate your space. Made from high-quality PE synthetic fir and adorned with pine cones and red berries, these wreaths are the perfect addition to your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, or shelves. The warm yellow LED lights add a cozy glow to your holiday decor, creating a festive atmosphere for Christmas parties and gatherings. Bring the magic of the season into your home with this beautiful set of Christmas wreaths.
